Class Slice

java.lang.Object
Slice
public class Slice
extends java.lang.Object
A class representing a slice on the wheel.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    java.lang.String colour
    The ASCII colour code for the slice
    boolean endsTurn
    Whether the turn should end after the player guesses regardless of whether their answer is correct.
    java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onSelected
    The action to perform when the slice is first spun.
    java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onWon
    The action to perform when the slice is spun and the player guesses a letter correctly.
    java.lang.String text
    The text to display on the slice when spinning

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Slice​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String colour, java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onSelected, java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onWon)
    Constructs a new Slice class.
    Slice​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String colour, java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onSelected, java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onWon, boolean endsTurn)
    Constructs a new Slice class.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • text

      public java.lang.String text
      The text to display on the slice when spinning

    • colour

      public java.lang.String colour
      The ASCII colour code for the slice

    • onSelected

      public java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onSelected
      The action to perform when the slice is first spun.

    • onWon

      public java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onWon
      The action to perform when the slice is spun and the player guesses a letter correctly.

    • endsTurn

      public boolean endsTurn
      Whether the turn should end after the player guesses regardless of whether their answer is correct. True means the turn ends.

  • Constructor Details

    • Slice

      public Slice​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String colour, java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onSelected, java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onWon)
      Constructs a new Slice class.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to display on the slice when spinning.
      colour - The ASCII colour code for the slice
      onSelected - The action to perform when the slice is first spun. It is assumed that null means no action is to be taken.
      onWon - The action to perform when the slice is spun and the player guesses a letter correctly. It is assumed that null means no action is to be taken.

    • Slice

      public Slice​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String colour, java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onSelected, java.util.function.Consumer<Player> onWon, boolean endsTurn)
      Constructs a new Slice class.
      Parameters:
      text - The text to display on the slice when spinning.
      colour - The ASCII colour code for the slice
      onSelected - The action to perform when the slice is first spun. It is assumed that null means no action is to be taken.
      onWon - The action to perform when the slice is spun and the player guesses a letter correctly. It is assumed that null means no action is to be taken.
      endsTurn - Whether the turn should end after the player guesses regardless of whether their answer is correct. True means the turn ends.
